title: Roger Waters-Live 2-5-07 AVI@192 mp3 (fantastic)
description:
Hey,
  This is Roger Waters Live, Brisbane 2-5-07, which is available on TPB in full DVD format (DVD Shrink) but it&#039;s in PAL not NTSC. PAL doesn&#039;t work on any of my standalone players, thus the .avi conversion here. 
  
  Disc 1 and 2 included here and this is a GREAT audiance shot with stuningly good sound. It appears to me that the folks who made this had access to the soundboard and you&#039;ll notice light or sound cables in the center of the picture. I&#039;m assuming the video was taken from the sound platform. 

 The setlist wasn&#039;t included in the download but I have one from an audio bootleg from the same tour. (NYC) It is......

    Roger Waters-Live NYC 2007-for Brisbane upload of same year/tour. (setlist)


First Set:
[total time 1:12:17]
01 In The Flesh
02 Mother
03 Set The Controls For the Heart Of The Sun
04 Shine On You Crazy Diamond
05 Have A Cigar
06 Wish You Were Here
07 Southampton Dock
08 The Fletcher Memorial Home
09 Perfect Sense Parts 1 and 2
10 Leaving Beirut
11 Sheep 

Second Set
[total time 1:06:54]
01 Dark Side of the Moon
Encores:
02 Band Introductions
03 The Happiest Days Of Our Lives
04 Another Brick In The Wall (Part 2)
05 Vera
06 Bring the Boys Back Home 
07 Comfortably Numb

I hope it helps more people enjoy this fantastic fan effort.        srw567
